nodes.bodyText: nit: probably don't want to be committing this!
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -56,7 +56,7 @@ ksql.logging.processing.stream.auto.create=true
 #------ External service config -------
 
 # The set of Kafka brokers to bootstrap Kafka cluster information from:
-bootstrap.servers=localhost:9092
+bootstrap.servers=localhost:29092

nodes.bodyText: I think we should flip the semantics of the if statement here and instead return early if the structToSchemaName already contains the entry - that way we wont be incrementing structSchemaCount or adding the unnecessary argument to the argumentBuilder.

I forgot to tell you offline, but whenever you add a new test to the QTT (QueryTranslationTest) suite you need to run PlannedTestGeneratorTest manually (and remove the @Ignore annotation) to generate historical plans. These historical plans don't change across versions so we make sure that future versions running the old code will not deviate in behavior.
Oops I forgot to uncomment the @ignore in the PlannedTestGeneratorTest, will submit new change shortly!
let's move the if branch one line up (to make sure that we don't unnecessarily increment structSchemaCount)
